text: Wolfgang J. Fuchs (16 September 1945 - 20 January 2020) was a German historian and comic book translator. He was born in Unsleben, Germany. He was known as the main editor of Die tollsten Geschichten von Donald Duck – Sonderheft, a German Disney comic. He was also known for his comic Disneys Heimliche Helden (2005–2009). Fuchs died on 20 January 2020 in Munich at the age of 74.Wolfgang Fuchs – RIP ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German historians Category:German translators Category:German editors
title: Wolfgang J. Fuchs
